content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) used for smelting iron ore into iron-plate.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) used for smelting copper ore into copper-plate.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) with lab input {'automation-science-pack': 10}, status NO_POWER, research set to automation, electrical_id updated to 23980.
- ElectricityGroup connecting small electric poles at positions (8.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), (9.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(-10.5, 18.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(-10.5, 18.5) used for producing electricity; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"], status NOT_CONNECTED, and connection_points at (-10.5, 16.0) and (-10.5, 21.0).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for heating water; status NO_FUEL with warning ["out of fuel"], connection_points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), linked to fluid_system [116411] (with associated fluid_box details) and steam_output_point at (-7.5, 24.5).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) used for water intake; status WORKING, connection_points at (-9.5, 23.5), linked to fluid_system [116411] (with related fluid_box settings).
- Wooden chest at position(-4.5, 25.5) serving as the manual fuel feeding system.
- Pipeline Network consisting of the following PipeGroup structures:
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 116411 at position(-5.5, 19.5) – status WORKING.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 116410 at position(-2.5, 19.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 116423 at position(5.5, 21.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 116422 at position(1.5, 23.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 116418 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 116427 at position(0.5, 24.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 116426 at position(1.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 116429 at position(1.5, 27.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 116430 at position(4.5, 27.5) – status EMPTY.
  • PipeGroup with fluid_system = 116431 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Candidate Pipe Group Connection Failures (Historical Aggregation):
  - Ensure that the fluid_system identifiers used during connection attempts match active PipeGroup entities and are within the proper spatial range.

• Candidate Pipe Group Connection Failures (Recent Steps 2384–2399):
  - Multiple connection attempts using candidate pipe groups with fluid_system values [115083, 115167, 115249, 115333, 115415, 115499, 115581, 115665, 115747, 115831, 115913, 115997, 116079, 116163, 116245, 116329] returned no candidates within a 15-unit radius around position (-5.5, 19.5).
  - Tip: Cross-check the search parameters and reference the active pipeline fluid system (e.g., fluid_system 116411) to ensure candidate selection aligns with current entity configurations.
